column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Arkhamknight93 - Thank you for your review. For the record
column2: we receive routine health inspections from the City of Houston
column3: and we have passed favorably and are in good standing. We set EMPTY pots on the floor beside the dishwasher
column5: our soup pots are carried from the racks in our walk-in cooler to the gas burners that are located behind our ramen stations. Please let me know if you have any further questions. Thank you again.
